element.name: TChartAxisTitle.Distance
element.short: The distance between the title text and axis marks

element.name: TChartAxisTitle.Font
element.descr: Font.Orientation is by default set to 900 (90 degrees to the left) for vertical axises.

element.name: TChartAxisTitle.Visible
element.short: Title is shown if Visible is true and Caption is not empty

element.name: TChartAxis.Alignment
element.short: Determines the side of the chart whcih the axis is aligned to
element.descr: Left- and right-aligned axises are vertical, top- and bottom-aligned axises are horizontal.

element.name: TChartAxis.Grid
element.descr: Grid lines are drawn across the chart from each axis mark

element.name: TChartAxis.Visible
element.short: If true, the axis is drawn on the chart
element.descr: Invisible axis might still be used for series transformation

descr.p: If the source is set, marks are determined by X or Y coordinates of Source items for horizontal and vertical axises correspondingly.
